verses.verse: I have <S%H157>loved<s%> you, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> Yet ye <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherein<s%> hast thou <S%H157>loved<s%> us? Was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H251>brother?<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> yet I <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%>

And I <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and his <S%H5159>heritage<s%> <S%H8077>waste<s%> for the <S%H8568>dragons<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

Whereas <S%H3588><s%> <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H559>saith,<s%> We are <S%H7567>impoverished,<s%> but we will <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> the desolate <S%H2723>places;<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H1992>They<s%> shall <S%H1129>build,<s%> but <S%H589>I<s%> will throw <S%H2040>down;<s%> and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> them, The <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H7564>wickedness,<s%> and, The <S%H5971>people<s%> against <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H2194>indignation<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H859>ye<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will be <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

A <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3513>honoreth<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and a <S%H5650>servant<s%> his <S%H113>master:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> then <S%H589>I<s%> be a <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H346>where<s%> is mine <S%H3519>honor?<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> be a <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H346>where<s%> is my <S%H4172>fear?<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> unto you, O <S%H3548>priests,<s%> that <S%H959>despise<s%> my <S%H8034>name.<s%> And ye <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherein<s%> have we <S%H959>despised<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8034>name?<s%>

Ye <S%H5066>offer<s%> <S%H1351>polluted<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> mine <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and ye <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherein<s%> have we <S%H1351>polluted<s%> thee? In that ye <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H7979>table<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H959>contemptible.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> ye <S%H5066>offer<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> for <S%H2076>sacrifice,<s%> is it <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H7451>evil?<s%> and <S%H3588>if<s%> ye <S%H5066>offer<s%> the <S%H6455>lame<s%> and <S%H2470>sick,<s%> is it <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H7451>evil?<s%> <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H4994>now<s%> unto thy <S%H6346>governor;<s%> will he be <S%H7521>pleased<s%> with thee, <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5375>accept<s%> thy <S%H6440>person?<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> <S%H2470>beseech<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> that he will be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto us: <S%H2063>this<s%> hath <S%H1961>been<s%> by your <S%H4480>means:<s%> <S%H3027><s%> will he <S%H5375>regard<s%> <S%H4480>your<s%> <S%H6440>persons?<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is there <S%H1571>even<s%> among you that would <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> for naught? <S%H3808>neither<s%> do ye <S%H215>kindle<s%> fire on mine <S%H4196>altar<s%> for <S%H2600>naught.<s%> I have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> in you, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H7521>accept<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> at your <S%H4480>hand.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> from the <S%H4480>rising<s%> <S%H4217><s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the going <S%H3996>down<s%> of the same my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H1419>great<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles;<s%> and in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> shall be <S%H5066>offered<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and a <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4503>offering:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H1419>great<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

But <S%H859>ye<s%> have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> it, in that ye <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H7979>table<s%> of the <S%H136>LORD<s%> is <S%H1351>polluted;<s%> and the <S%H5108>fruit<s%> thereof, even his <S%H400>meat,<s%> is <S%H959>contemptible.<s%>

Ye <S%H559>said<s%> also, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> what a <S%H4972>weariness<s%> <S%H8513><s%> is it! and ye have snuffed <S%H5301>at<s%> it, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> and ye <S%H935>brought<s%> that which was <S%H1497>torn,<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame,<s%> and the <S%H2470>sick;<s%> thus ye <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> an <S%H4503>offering:<s%> should I <S%H7521>accept<s%> this of your <S%H4480>hand?<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But <S%H779>cursed<s%> be the <S%H5230>deceiver,<s%> which <S%H3426>hath<s%> in his <S%H5739>flock<s%> a <S%H2145>male,<s%> and <S%H5087>voweth,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificeth<s%> unto the <S%H136>Lord<s%> a corrupt <S%H7843>thing:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>King,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and my <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3372>dreadful<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>
